trans-unit.source: Enable remote debugging with continuous delivery
trans-unit.target: Enable remote debugging with continuous delivery

trans-unit.source: Learn how to enable remote debugging when using continuous delivery to deploy to Azure
trans-unit.target: Learn how to enable remote debugging when using continuous delivery to deploy to Azure

trans-unit.source: Enable remote debugging when using continuous delivery to publish to Azure
trans-unit.target: Enable remote debugging when using continuous delivery to publish to Azure

trans-unit.source: You can enable remote debugging in Azure when you use [continuous delivery](cloud-services-dotnet-continuous-delivery.md) to publish to Azure by following these steps.
trans-unit.target: You can enable remote debugging in Azure when you use [continuous delivery](cloud-services-dotnet-continuous-delivery.md) to publish to Azure by following these steps.

trans-unit.source: Enabling remote debugging for cloud services
trans-unit.target: Enabling remote debugging for cloud services

trans-unit.source: Enabling remote debugging for virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Enabling remote debugging for virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Enabling remote debugging for cloud services
trans-unit.target: Enabling remote debugging for cloud services

trans-unit.source: On the build agent, set up the initial environment for Azure as outlined in [Command-Line Build for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh535755.aspx).
trans-unit.target: On the build agent, set up the initial environment for Azure as outlined in [Command-Line Build for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh535755.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Because the remote debug runtime (msvsmon.exe) is required for the package, install the [Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=46874) (or the [Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2013 Update 5 RC](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=46870) if you’re using Visual Studio 2013).
trans-unit.target: Because the remote debug runtime (msvsmon.exe) is required for the package, install the [Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=46874) (or the [Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2013 Update 5 RC](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=46870) if you’re using Visual Studio 2013).

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can copy the remote debug binaries from a system that has Visual Studio installed.
trans-unit.target: As an alternative, you can copy the remote debug binaries from a system that has Visual Studio installed.

trans-unit.source: Create a certificate as outlined in [Create a Service Certificate for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg432987.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Create a certificate as outlined in [Create a Service Certificate for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg432987.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Keep the .pfx and RDP certificate thumbprint and upload the certificate to the target cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Keep the .pfx and RDP certificate thumbprint and upload the certificate to the target cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Use the following options in the MSBuild command line to build and package with remote debug enabled.
trans-unit.target: Use the following options in the MSBuild command line to build and package with remote debug enabled.

trans-unit.source: (Substitute actual paths to your system and project files for the angle-bracketed items.)
trans-unit.target: (Substitute actual paths to your system and project files for the angle-bracketed items.)

trans-unit.source: `VSX64RemoteDebuggerPath` is the path to the folder containing msvsmon.exe in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: `VSX64RemoteDebuggerPath` is the path to the folder containing msvsmon.exe in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Publish to the target cloud service by using the package and .cscfg file generated in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: Publish to the target cloud service by using the package and .cscfg file generated in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: Import the certificate (.pfx file) to the machine that has Visual Studio with Azure SDK for .NET installed.
trans-unit.target: Import the certificate (.pfx file) to the machine that has Visual Studio with Azure SDK for .NET installed.

trans-unit.source: Enabling remote debugging for virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Enabling remote debugging for virtual machines

trans-unit.source: See [Create a Virtual Machine Running Windows Server](../virtual-machines-windows-tutorial.md) or [Creating Azure Virtual Machines in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn569263.aspx).
trans-unit.target: See [Create a Virtual Machine Running Windows Server](../virtual-machines-windows-tutorial.md) or [Creating Azure Virtual Machines in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn569263.aspx).

trans-unit.source: On the [Azure portal page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=269851), view the virtual machine dashboard to see the virtual machine’s “RDP Certificate Thumbprint”.
trans-unit.target: On the [Azure portal page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=269851), view the virtual machine dashboard to see the virtual machine’s “RDP Certificate Thumbprint”.

trans-unit.source: This is used for the `ServerThumbprint` value in the extension configuration.
trans-unit.target: This is used for the `ServerThumbprint` value in the extension configuration.

trans-unit.source: Create a client certificate as outlined in [Create a Service Certificate for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg432987.aspx) (keep the .pfx and RDP certificate thumbprint).
trans-unit.target: Create a client certificate as outlined in [Create a Service Certificate for Azure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg432987.aspx) (keep the .pfx and RDP certificate thumbprint).

trans-unit.source: Install [Azure Powershell](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9811175&clcid=0x409) (version 0.7.4 or later) from the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Install [Azure Powershell](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9811175&clcid=0x409) (version 0.7.4 or later) from the Microsoft Download Center.

trans-unit.source: Run the following script to enable the RemoteDebug extension.
trans-unit.target: Run the following script to enable the RemoteDebug extension.

trans-unit.source: Replace the paths and personal data with your own, such as your subscription name, service name, and thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: Replace the paths and personal data with your own, such as your subscription name, service name, and thumbprint.

trans-unit.source: (NOTE: This script is configured for Visual Studio 2015 RC.
trans-unit.target: (NOTE: This script is configured for Visual Studio 2015 RC.

trans-unit.source: If you’re using Visual Studio 2013, use "RemoteDebugVS2013" for ReferenceName and ExtensionName.)
trans-unit.target: If you’re using Visual Studio 2013, use "RemoteDebugVS2013" for ReferenceName and ExtensionName.)

trans-unit.source: Import the certificate (.pfx) to the machine that has Visual Studio with Azure SDK for .NET installed.
trans-unit.target: Import the certificate (.pfx) to the machine that has Visual Studio with Azure SDK for .NET installed.
